item.title: How to Create a Hugo Blog
item.description: Note: This is for mac. # Install Hugo. (Requires homebrew) brew install hugo # Generate new site. (Site folder 'myblog' is stored in /Users/<User Name>/) hugo new site myblog # Change directory to site folder. cd myblog # Install theme. (More themes found at https://themes.gohugo.io/) git init git submodule add https://github.com/nanxstats/hugo-tanka.git themes/hugo-tanka # Set theme. echo theme = \"hugo-tanka\" >> config.toml # Create first post. hugo new mypost.md # Start server to preview site.
